item.title: Node.js Lambda Structure
item.description:
Node.js Lambda Functions Structure

Project Structure

smart-cooking-backend/
├── src/
│   ├── handlers/
│   │   ├── auth/
│   │   │   ├── register.js
│   │   │   ├── login.js
│   │   │   └── post-confirmation.js
│   │   ├── users/
│   │   │   ├── get-profile.js
│   │   │   ├── update-profile.js
│   │   │   ├── update-privacy.js
│   │   │   └── get-privacy.js
│   │   ├── recipes/
│   │   │   ├── create-recipe.js
│   │   │   ├── get-recipe.js
│   │   │   ├── update-recipe.js
│   │   │   ├── delete-recipe.js
│   │   │   └── search-recipes.js
│   │   ├── ingredients/
│   │   │   ├── add-ingredient.js
│   │   │   ├── get-ingredients.js
│   │   │   └── delete-ingredient.js
│   │   ├── ai/
│   │   │   ├── suggest-recipe.js
│   │   │   ├── get-suggestions.js
│   │   │   └── feedback.js
│   │   ├── social/
│   │   │   ├── send-friend-request.js
│   │   │   ├── accept-friend.js
│   │   │   ├── reject-friend.js
│   │   │   ├── get-friends.js
│   │   │   └── remove-friend.js
│   │   └── admin/
│   │       ├── get-users.js
│   │       ├── ban-user.js
│   │       ├── unban-user.js
│   │       ├── get-statistics.js
│   │       └── moderate-recipe.js
│   ├── services/
│   │   ├── dynamodb.service.js
│   │   ├── s3.service.js
│   │   ├── bedrock.service.js
│   │   ├── cognito.service.js
│   │   └── privacy.service.js
│   ├── models/
│   │   ├── User.js
│   │   ├── Recipe.js
│   │   ├── Ingredient.js
│   │   ├── Privacy.js
│   │   └── Friendship.js
│   ├── utils/
│   │   ├── response.js
│   │   ├── validation.js
│   │   ├── error-handler.js
│   │   └── logger.js
│   └── middleware/
│       ├── auth.js
│       ├── admin-check.js
│       └── privacy-filter.js
├── tests/
│   ├── unit/
│   └── integration/
├── package.json
├── serverless.yml
└── README.md

Core Dependencies

{
  "name": "smart-cooking-backend",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "Smart Cooking App Backend - AWS Lambda Functions",
  "dependencies": {
    "@aws-sdk/client-dynamodb": "^3.x.x",
    "@aws-sdk/client-s3": "^3.x.x",
    "@aws-sdk/client-bedrock-runtime": "^3.x.x",
    "@aws-sdk/client-cognito-identity-provider": "^3.x.x",
    "@aws-sdk/lib-dynamodb": "^3.x.x",
    "uuid": "^9.x.x",
    "joi": "^17.x.x"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "serverless": "^3.x.x",
    "serverless-offline": "^13.x.x",
    "jest": "^29.x.x",
    "eslint": "^8.x.x"
  }
}

Lambda Handler Example

User Profile Handler

// src/handlers/users/get-profile.js
const { DynamoDBClient } = require('@aws-sdk/client-dynamodb');
const { DynamoDBDocumentClient, GetCommand } = require('@aws-sdk/lib-dynamodb');
const { successResponse, errorResponse } = require('../../utils/response');
const { applyPrivacyFilter } = require('../../middleware/privacy-filter');

const client = new DynamoDBClient({});
const docClient = DynamoDBDocumentClient.from(client);

exports.handler = async (event) => {
  try {
    const { userId } = event.pathParameters;
    const requesterId = event.requestContext.authorizer.claims.sub;

    // Get user profile
    const userResult = await docClient.send(new GetCommand({
      TableName: process.env.USERS_TABLE,
      Key: { user_id: userId }
    }));

    if (!userResult.Item) {
      return errorResponse(404, 'User not found');
    }

    // Get privacy settings
    const privacyResult = await docClient.send(new GetCommand({
      TableName: process.env.PRIVACY_TABLE,
      Key: { user_id: userId }
    }));

    // Check friendship status
    const isFriend = await checkFriendship(userId, requesterId);

    // Apply privacy filters
    const filteredProfile = applyPrivacyFilter(
      userResult.Item,
      privacyResult.Item,
      requesterId,
      isFriend
    );

    return successResponse(filteredProfile);
  } catch (error) {
    console.error('Error:', error);
    return errorResponse(500, 'Internal server error');
  }
};

AI Suggestion Handler

// src/handlers/ai/suggest-recipe.js
const { BedrockRuntimeClient, InvokeModelCommand } = require('@aws-sdk/client-bedrock-runtime');
const { DynamoDBDocumentClient, GetCommand, PutCommand } = require('@aws-sdk/lib-dynamodb');
const { v4: uuidv4 } = require('uuid');

const bedrockClient = new BedrockRuntimeClient({ region: 'us-east-1' });

exports.handler = async (event) => {
  try {
    const userId = event.requestContext.authorizer.claims.sub;
    const body = JSON.parse(event.body);

    // Get user preferences
    const preferences = await getUserPreferences(userId);

    // Get user ingredients
    const ingredients = await getUserIngredients(userId);

    // Build AI prompt
    const prompt = buildPrompt(preferences, ingredients, body);

    // Call Bedrock Claude
    const modelInput = {
      modelId: 'anthropic.claude-3-haiku-20240307-v1:0',
      contentType: 'application/json',
      accept: 'application/json',
      body: JSON.stringify({
        anthropic_version: 'bedrock-2023-05-31',
        max_tokens: 2000,
        messages: [
          {
            role: 'user',
            content: prompt
          }
        ]
      })
    };

    const command = new InvokeModelCommand(modelInput);
    const response = await bedrockClient.send(command);

    const responseBody = JSON.parse(new TextDecoder().decode(response.body));
    const aiSuggestion = responseBody.content[0].text;

    // Save suggestion to DynamoDB
    const suggestionId = uuidv4();
    await saveSuggestion(userId, suggestionId, aiSuggestion, ingredients);

    return successResponse({
      suggestion_id: suggestionId,
      suggestion: JSON.parse(aiSuggestion)
    });
  } catch (error) {
    console.error('Error:', error);
    return errorResponse(500, 'Failed to generate suggestion');
  }
};

function buildPrompt(preferences, ingredients, userInput) {
  return `You are a professional chef assistant. Create a recipe suggestion based on:

User Profile:
- Dietary restrictions: ${preferences.dietary_restrictions || 'None'}
- Allergies: ${preferences.allergies || 'None'}
- Favorite cuisines: ${preferences.favorite_cuisines || 'Any'}
- Preferred cooking methods: ${preferences.cooking_methods || 'Any'}

Available Ingredients: ${ingredients.map(i => i.ingredient_name).join(', ')}

User Request: ${userInput.request || 'Suggest something delicious'}

Respond in JSON format:
{
  "recipe_name": "string",
  "description": "string",
  "ingredients": [{"name": "string", "quantity": "string"}],
  "instructions": ["step1", "step2", ...],
  "prep_time": number,
  "cook_time": number,
  "servings": number,
  "difficulty": "easy|medium|hard",
  "nutrition": {"calories": number, "protein": "string", "carbs": "string"}
}`;
}

Privacy Filter Middleware

// src/middleware/privacy-filter.js
exports.applyPrivacyFilter = (user, privacySettings, requesterId, isFriend) => {
  const isOwner = user.user_id === requesterId;

  // Owner sees everything
  if (isOwner) return user;

  const settings = privacySettings || getDefaultPrivacy();
  const filtered = { ...user };

  // Apply privacy rules
  if (!canView(settings.email_visibility, isFriend)) {
    delete filtered.email;
  }

  if (!canView(settings.date_of_birth_visibility, isFriend)) {
    delete filtered.date_of_birth;
  }

  if (!canView(settings.gender_visibility, isFriend)) {
    delete filtered.gender;
  }

  if (!canView(settings.country_visibility, isFriend)) {
    delete filtered.country;
  }

  return filtered;
};

function canView(visibilitySetting, isFriend) {
  if (visibilitySetting === 'public') return true;
  if (visibilitySetting === 'friends' && isFriend) return true;
  return false; // private
}

function getDefaultPrivacy() {
  return {
    profile_visibility: 'public',
    email_visibility: 'private',
    date_of_birth_visibility: 'friends',
    gender_visibility: 'public',
    country_visibility: 'public',
    recipes_visibility: 'public',
    ingredients_visibility: 'friends',
    preferences_visibility: 'friends'
  };
}

Admin Middleware

// src/middleware/admin-check.js
const { DynamoDBDocumentClient, GetCommand } = require('@aws-sdk/lib-dynamodb');
const { errorResponse } = require('../utils/response');

exports.requireAdmin = async (event) => {
  const userId = event.requestContext.authorizer.claims.sub;

  const result = await docClient.send(new GetCommand({
    TableName: process.env.USERS_TABLE,
    Key: { user_id: userId }
  }));

  if (!result.Item || result.Item.role !== 'admin') {
    throw new Error('Forbidden: Admin access required');
  }

  return result.Item;
};

Serverless Framework Configuration

# serverless.yml
service: smart-cooking-backend

provider:
  name: aws
  runtime: nodejs20.x
  region: us-east-1
  stage: ${opt:stage, 'dev'}
  environment:
    USERS_TABLE: ${self:service}-users-${self:provider.stage}
    RECIPES_TABLE: ${self:service}-recipes-${self:provider.stage}
    PRIVACY_TABLE: ${self:service}-privacy-${self:provider.stage}
    FRIENDSHIPS_TABLE: ${self:service}-friendships-${self:provider.stage}
    AI_SUGGESTIONS_TABLE: ${self:service}-ai-suggestions-${self:provider.stage}
    S3_BUCKET: ${self:service}-uploads-${self:provider.stage}

  iam:
    role:
      statements:
        - Effect: Allow
          Action:
            - dynamodb:GetItem
            - dynamodb:PutItem
            - dynamodb:UpdateItem
            - dynamodb:DeleteItem
            - dynamodb:Query
            - dynamodb:Scan
          Resource:
            - arn:aws:dynamodb:${self:provider.region}:*:table/${self:provider.environment.USERS_TABLE}
            - arn:aws:dynamodb:${self:provider.region}:*:table/${self:provider.environment.RECIPES_TABLE}
            - arn:aws:dynamodb:${self:provider.region}:*:table/${self:provider.environment.PRIVACY_TABLE}
            - arn:aws:dynamodb:${self:provider.region}:*:table/${self:provider.environment.FRIENDSHIPS_TABLE}
            - arn:aws:dynamodb:${self:provider.region}:*:table/${self:provider.environment.AI_SUGGESTIONS_TABLE}
        - Effect: Allow
          Action:
            - s3:PutObject
            - s3:GetObject
          Resource: arn:aws:s3:::${self:provider.environment.S3_BUCKET}/*
        - Effect: Allow
          Action:
            - bedrock:InvokeModel
          Resource: arn:aws:bedrock:*:*:model/*

functions:
  # Auth
  register:
    handler: src/handlers/auth/register.handler
    events:
      - http:
          path: auth/register
          method: post
          cors: true

  # User Profile
  getProfile:
    handler: src/handlers/users/get-profile.handler
    events:
      - http:
          path: user/profile/{userId}
          method: get
          cors: true
          authorizer:
            type: COGNITO_USER_POOLS
            authorizerId: !Ref ApiGatewayAuthorizer

  updatePrivacy:
    handler: src/handlers/users/update-privacy.handler
    events:
      - http:
          path: user/privacy
          method: put
          cors: true
          authorizer:
            type: COGNITO_USER_POOLS
            authorizerId: !Ref ApiGatewayAuthorizer

  # AI
  suggestRecipe:
    handler: src/handlers/ai/suggest-recipe.handler
    timeout: 60
    events:
      - http:
          path: ai/suggest
          method: post
          cors: true
          authorizer:
            type: COGNITO_USER_POOLS
            authorizerId: !Ref ApiGatewayAuthorizer

  # Social
  sendFriendRequest:
    handler: src/handlers/social/send-friend-request.handler
    events:
      - http:
          path: friends/request
          method: post
          cors: true
          authorizer:
            type: COGNITO_USER_POOLS
            authorizerId: !Ref ApiGatewayAuthorizer

  # Admin
  banUser:
    handler: src/handlers/admin/ban-user.handler
    events:
      - http:
          path: admin/users/{userId}/ban
          method: put
          cors: true
          authorizer:
            type: COGNITO_USER_POOLS
            authorizerId: !Ref ApiGatewayAuthorizer

resources:
  Resources:
    UsersTable:
      Type: AWS::DynamoDB::Table
      Properties:
        TableName: ${self:provider.environment.USERS_TABLE}
        BillingMode: PAY_PER_REQUEST
        AttributeDefinitions:
          - AttributeName: user_id
            AttributeType: S
        KeySchema:
          - AttributeName: user_id
            KeyType: HASH

    RecipesTable:
      Type: AWS::DynamoDB::Table
      Properties:
        TableName: ${self:provider.environment.RECIPES_TABLE}
        BillingMode: PAY_PER_REQUEST
        AttributeDefinitions:
          - AttributeName: recipe_id
            AttributeType: S
          - AttributeName: user_id
            AttributeType: S
        KeySchema:
          - AttributeName: recipe_id
            KeyType: HASH
        GlobalSecondaryIndexes:
          - IndexName: UserIdIndex
            KeySchema:
              - AttributeName: user_id
                KeyType: HASH
            Projection:
              ProjectionType: ALL

    PrivacyTable:
      Type: AWS::DynamoDB::Table
      Properties:
        TableName: ${self:provider.environment.PRIVACY_TABLE}
        BillingMode: PAY_PER_REQUEST
        AttributeDefinitions:
          - AttributeName: user_id
            AttributeType: S
        KeySchema:
          - AttributeName: user_id
            KeyType: HASH

    FriendshipsTable:
      Type: AWS::DynamoDB::Table
      Properties:
        TableName: ${self:provider.environment.FRIENDSHIPS_TABLE}
        BillingMode: PAY_PER_REQUEST
        AttributeDefinitions:
          - AttributeName: user_id
            AttributeType: S
          - AttributeName: friend_id
            AttributeType: S
        KeySchema:
          - AttributeName: user_id
            KeyType: HASH
          - AttributeName: friend_id
            KeyType: RANGE

plugins:
  - serverless-offline

Deployment Commands

# Install dependencies
npm install

# Run locally
npm run dev

# Deploy to dev
serverless deploy --stage dev

# Deploy to production
serverless deploy --stage prod

# Invoke function locally
serverless invoke local --function suggestRecipe --data '{"body": "{}"}'

# View logs
serverless logs --function suggestRecipe --tail

Testing Strategy

// tests/unit/privacy-filter.test.js
const { applyPrivacyFilter } = require('../../src/middleware/privacy-filter');

describe('Privacy Filter', () => {
  test('Owner sees all fields', () => {
    const user = { user_id: '123', email: 'test@test.com' };
    const result = applyPrivacyFilter(user, null, '123', false);
    expect(result.email).toBe('test@test.com');
  });

  test('Stranger cannot see private email', () => {
    const user = { user_id: '123', email: 'test@test.com' };
    const privacy = { email_visibility: 'private' };
    const result = applyPrivacyFilter(user, privacy, '456', false);
    expect(result.email).toBeUndefined();
  });

  test('Friend can see friends-only fields', () => {
    const user = { user_id: '123', date_of_birth: '1990-01-01' };
    const privacy = { date_of_birth_visibility: 'friends' };
    const result = applyPrivacyFilter(user, privacy, '456', true);
    expect(result.date_of_birth).toBe('1990-01-01');
  });
});
